messages.subject: Re: Children as messiah
messages.msgSnippet: To Brenda and all who have written on the topic of children as messiah : The best book I ever read that spotlights the divinity in every human being is
messages.messageBody:
To Brenda and all who have written on the topic of "children as messiah":

The best book I ever read that spotlights the divinity in every human being
is "Franny and Zooey" by J.D. Salinger.

It is not just our children whom we should view as temporal manifestations
of the deity... it is every human being we encounter, most particularly the
ones we wish to be around the least. The mean "Fat Lady" fanning herself on
the porch is Jesus.

Imagine the president of the School Board, yall...

Annette
